sentences.en: A house design should have some affinity with the surrounding architecture.
sentences.cn: 房屋的设计应与周围建筑在一定程度上谐调.

sentences.en: At first he studied architecture, but later he switched to geology.
sentences.cn: 他原是学建筑的, 中途改行搞地质了.

sentences.en: Columns are usually intended in architecture to add grandeur and status.
sentences.cn: 圆柱在建筑中通常用来增添气势和显示地位。
他在大学里读的是建筑学。
我对古典建筑风格不感兴趣.

sentences.en: Major works of painting, sculpture, mosaic and architecture were examined in situ in Venice.
sentences.cn: 重要的绘画、雕塑、镶嵌画和建筑作品都在威尼斯原地得到了仔细检查。
现代/古典/中世纪等的建筑风格

sentences.en: Painting sculpture architecture etc. are collectively called the " fine arts " or " plastic arts " .
sentences.cn: 绘画、雕塑、建筑等统称为 造型艺术.

sentences.en: the architecture of the eighteenth century
The economic gloom of the early 1980s was relieved by fanciful architecture.
sentences.cn: 20世纪80年代初期的经济萧条气氛因各种奇异古怪建筑的出现而有所缓解。

sentences.en: the grandeur and simplicity of Roman architecture
sentences.cn: 古罗马建筑的雄伟和简朴

sentences.en: The house is a textbook example of medieval domestic architecture.
sentences.cn: 这所房子是典型的中世纪民居。

sentences.en: The legacy of Ancient Rome represented the overwhelming influence on Romanesque architecture.
sentences.cn: 古罗马的遗产体现在对罗马式建筑的巨大影响上.

sentences.en: the strength and solidity of Romanesque architecture
sentences.cn: 罗马式建筑坚固结实的特性

sentences.en: These two buildings typify the rich extremes of Irish architecture.
sentences.cn: 这两座建筑物体现了爱尔兰建筑风格的极致多变。

words.tran_cn: 建筑术的；组织的；知识体系的
建筑学的；建筑上的；符合建筑法的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 古典建筑；古希腊与罗马之建筑
分布结构，分布式体系结构
硬件体系结构，硬件总体结构

造园术，园林建筑学；造景建筑业
造船学，造船工程；海洋建筑工程，海事工程

trans.tran_cn: 建筑学，建筑式样，建筑风格，体系结构，结构，架构
trans.tran_en: the style and design of a building or buildings
